title: Got pulsefire ez in a crate, but haven't got access to it?
body:
I crafted it into the skin, since i have like 4k orange essence, it even told me that i now own pulsefire ezreal, but i get into a game to play ez, and i can't select it

WTF is going on here?

replies.body: 104 views, and still no help Riot is soo good at their job....
